description: Number of undirected circular permutations tau(1), ..., tau((p_n-1)/2) of 1, ..., (p_n-1)/2 such that the (p_n-1)/2 numbers tau(1)^2 + tau(2)^2, tau(2)^2 + tau(3)^2, ..., tau((p_n-3)/2)^2 + tau((p_n-1)/2)^2, tau((p_n-1)/2)^2 + tau(1)^2 give all the (p_n-1)/2 quadratic residues modulo p_n, where p_n is the n-th prime.
